summary: Iteration 8 - Full testing of landing page, login flow, and admin dashboard. All requested features are working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: Health check endpoint - 200 OK with correct service name
Backend: Admin login with correct credentials - 200 OK with token and user data
Backend: Admin login with wrong password - 401 rejected
Backend: Admin login with wrong email - 401 rejected
Backend: Dashboard stats endpoint returns all required fields (total_members, active_memberships, today_collection, present_today, absent_today)
Backend: Dashboard stats includes upcoming_renewals and regular_absentees arrays
Backend: Dashboard stats includes today_birthdays and upcoming_birthdays arrays
Backend: Dashboard stats requires authentication (403 without token)
Backend: Public plans endpoint - 200 OK
Backend: Public testimonials endpoint - 200 OK
Backend: Public trainers endpoint - 200 OK
Backend: Auth/me endpoint returns current user data
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly in dark mode (default)
Frontend: Logo displays correctly in navbar
Frontend: Theme toggle button visible and functional
Frontend: Theme toggle switches between 'dark' and 'light' classes on HTML element
Frontend: Landing page loads correctly in light mode after toggle
Frontend: Footer logo displays correctly
Frontend: Login button visible in navbar
Frontend: Join Now button visible in navbar
Frontend: Login page loads with proper form fields
Frontend: Login with admin credentials works (redirects to /dashboard/admin)
Frontend: Admin dashboard loads with all 5 stats cards (Total Members: 10, Active Memberships: 4, Today's Collection: ₹3,900, Present Today: 2, Absent Today: 3)
Frontend: Sidebar navigation visible and accessible
Frontend: Upcoming Renewals section visible
Frontend: Regular Absentees section visible with member list
Frontend: Today's Birthdays section visible
Frontend: Upcoming Birthdays section visible
Frontend: Recent Announcements section visible
Frontend: Theme toggle in dashboard header works
Frontend: User dropdown shows Admin User with correct role
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 8 tested all requested features: 1) Landing page works in both dark and light themes with proper logo display, 2) Theme toggle persists and works correctly on landing page and dashboard, 3) Login flow works with admin credentials (admin@f3fitness.com / admin123), 4) Admin dashboard displays all 5 stats cards, 5) Dashboard shows Upcoming Renewals and Regular Absentees sections, 6) Sidebar navigation is accessible with all menu items

mocked_apis.razorpay: Razorpay payment gateway integration is MOCKED

landing_page_dark_mode.details: Landing page loads with dark theme by default (bg-[#09090b]). Logo switches between dark and light versions based on theme.

landing_page_light_mode.details: Theme toggle switches to light mode (bg-gray-50). All UI elements adapt correctly to light theme.

logo_display.details: Logo displays in navbar and footer. Uses theme-aware logos (LOGO_DARK and LOGO_LIGHT constants).

login_functionality.details: Login with admin@f3fitness.com / admin123 works correctly. Redirects to /dashboard/admin after successful login.

admin_dashboard_stats.details: Dashboard shows 5 stats cards: Total Members (10), Active Memberships (4), Today's Collection (₹3,900), Present Today (2), Absent Today (3)

dashboard_renewals_absentees.details: Upcoming Renewals section shows 'No renewals due soon'. Regular Absentees (7+ days) section shows 3 members.

sidebar_navigation.details: Sidebar shows: Dashboard, Members & Staff, Payment Management, Attendance, Broadcast, Settings, My Profile

theme_toggle_persistence.details: Theme toggle works in both landing page and dashboard. Classes 'dark'/'light' are properly added/removed from HTML element.
